creator: admingarath@hotmail.com
text:
When trying to configure PHP 5.2.5 on a Ubuntu system running Apache 2.2.6, it
asks for apxs2. The tar.gz for Apache2.2.6 comes with apxs NOT apxs2. It is
impossible to configure Apache 2.2.6 to work with PHP without apxs2.
This has nothing to do with the httpd project.  The file's name is apxs.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
